description:
[h1][b]This mod adds 4 logic gates that are powered when one of the WASD keys gets pressed.[/b][/h1]
Connect them to a driver's seat.

The A and D only work on driver's seats with an animation, so not all modded seats will work.

[b]NOTE: This only works in the test branch! (0.3.0)[/b]

[b]Update 1:[/b]
[list]
[*] It actually works now. I forgot to add the output...
[/list]

[b]Update 2:[/b]
[list]
[*] The WASD Converters can now be connected to controllers. When only controllers are connected, they will act like they are connected to the driver's seat. So connecting non-controller parts, you will lose some functionality.
[*] Allowed engines to be connected to the output. You now have to use only one engine to rotate a bearing in both directions.
[/list]

[b]Update 3:[/b]
[list]
[*] The visuals should now work for multiplayer. (Although I haven't tested this)
[/list]

[b]TODO:[/b]
[list]
[*] [strike]Add new parts that check camera movement.[/strike] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1428574074]>>Camera Controls<<[/url]
[*] Make it turn on and off using a logic signal.
[*] [strike]Check if it works with all interactable parts.[/strike]
[*] [strike]Allow engines to be connected to the output.[/strike]
[/list]
name: WASD Converter
